content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I'm sure we can reach a fair agreement on the rental price. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. Therefore, I would like to offer 400 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 400 euros is far below my expectations. This is a brand-new apartment in the city center with all amenities nearby. I'm looking for a fair market price, which is significantly higher than your offer. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can increase my offer. How about 450 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While 450 euros is more in line with the market value, it still does not reflect the premium location and amenities of this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the quality and convenience of this property. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective. Here is my final offer: 500 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros is still not enough for this apartment. It's a brand-new, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location and condition of the apartment warrant a higher rent. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a price that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 500 euros is my limit. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I cannot afford a higher price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, Emilia. If you're unable to meet my expectations, I understand that we may not be able to proceed with the rental agreement. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding. There is nothing else I need assistance with. I wish you good luck finding a suitable tenant.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Emilia. I appreciate your time and effort. I hope to find a tenant who values the exceptional quality and location of this apartment. Good day to you!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
